# hazardTrackingMode

**Instance Property**

A value that configures the hazard tracking of tensors you create with this descriptor.

## Declaration

```swift
var hazardTrackingMode: MTLHazardTrackingMode { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value of this property is [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLHazardTrackingMode/default].
title: hazardTrackingMode
